author: TORON JAMES TJAMES@REPUBLICANHERALD.COM
title: Pottsville in driver's seat in win over rival Blue Mountain | Sports | republicanherald.com
text:
POTTSVILLE — It was a packed house at Alumni Field Wednesday as two rivals went head-to-head in a key conference matchup.
